text: John James Wade (7 June 1871 – 1937) was an English footballer who played in the Football League for Blackburn Rovers and Darwen. ==References== Category:1871 births Category:1937 deaths Category:English footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:English Football League players Category:Darwen F.C. players Category:Blackburn Rovers F.C. players
title: John Wade (footballer)
